programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this action-comedy features Govinda and Sanjay Dutt as conmen Tara and Sitara. Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Shakti - The Power
programme.desc: Directed by Krishna Vamsi, this drama stars Karisma Kapoor as Nandini, who, after her husband's death, finds herself trapped in a violent and oppressive village. Determined to escape with her son, she battles societal norms and familial opposition.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Shakti - The Power
programme.desc: Directed by Krishna Vamsi, this drama stars Karisma Kapoor as Nandini, who, after her husband's death, finds herself trapped in a violent and oppressive village. Determined to escape with her son, she battles societal norms and familial opposition.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this action-comedy features Govinda and Sanjay Dutt as conmen Tara and Sitara. Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: In this classic David Dhawan comedy, Raju, a railway coolie, is roped into a scheme to pose as a millionaire to marry the daughter of a status-obsessed man. As lies pile up, Raju juggles his dual identity, resulting in a series of humorous situations.

programme.title: NH 10
programme.desc: NH10 is an intense survival thriller starring Anushka Sharma as Meera, a woman who embarks on a road trip with her husband, only to witness an honor killing. When they intervene, they find themselves hunted by the perpetrators in a lawless rural region. The film explores themes of gender violence, societal injustice, and the terrifying vulnerability of urban citizens in rural anarchy. Directed by Navdeep Singh, NH10 delivers gripping tension, gritty realism, and a powerful female lead performance.
